# CVeetje

> AI-powered CV and motivation letter generator that transforms LinkedIn profiles into professional, job-tailored documents.

## About

CVeetje is a Dutch SaaS application that helps job seekers create professional CVs and motivation letters using AI. Users can import their LinkedIn profile, add a job vacancy, and get an AI-generated CV optimized for that specific position.

## Key Features

- LinkedIn profile parsing (text or screenshot upload)
- AI-powered CV generation with job-specific optimization
- Dynamic style generation based on industry and role
- Motivation letter generator
- Multiple export formats (PDF, DOCX)
- Profile management for multiple CVs
- Live preview and editing

## How It Works

1. User enters their LinkedIn profile (paste text or upload screenshots)
2. User adds a job vacancy (optional but recommended)
3. AI generates a unique style matching the industry
4. AI creates optimized CV content
5. User can preview, edit, and download

## Pricing

- Free: 5 downloads per month
- 5 credits: €4.99
- 15 credits: €12.99 (most popular)
- 30 credits: €22.99

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16 (React)
- Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage)
- Multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google)
- Puppeteer for PDF generation
- Deployed on Google Cloud Run

## Contact

Website: https://cveetje.nl
